comment: Bea's shut herself in the bathroom because I suggested she do the phase 3 phonics games instead of phase 2. In fact, as I typed she stomped out & shouted "I can't do phase 3" (she can) as she stormed to somewhere more comfortable to sulk
amr:
# ::snt Bea's shut herself in the bathroom because I suggested she do the phase 3 phonics games instead of phase 2. In fact, as I typed she stomped out & shouted "I can't do phase 3" (she can) as she stormed to somewhere more comfortable to sulk
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / shut-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Bea"))
            :ARG1 p
            :location (b / bathroom)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (s2 / suggest-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)
                        :ARG1 (d / do-02
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (g / game
                                    :mod (p2 / phonics)
                                    :mod (p3 / phase
                                          :mod 3))
                              :ARG1-of (ii2 / instead-of-91
                                    :ARG2 (d2 / do-02
                                          :ARG0 p
                                          :ARG1 (p4 / phase
                                                :mod 2)))))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (s3 / stomp-01
                  :ARG0 (s4 / she)
                  :direction (o / out))
            :op2 (s5 / shout-01
                  :ARG0 s4
                  :ARG1 (p5 / possible-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (d3 / do-02
                              :ARG0 s4
                              :ARG1 p3)))
            :time (t / type-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i))
            :time (s6 / storm-02
                  :ARG0 (s7 / she)
                  :destination (s8 / somewhere
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (c2 / comfortable-02
                                    :ARG0 s8)
                              :ARG3 (m2 / more)
                              :ARG4 (s9 / sulk-01
                                    :ARG0 s7))))
            :mod (ii4 / in-fact)))
